content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be quite comfortable and ideally located. Let's get down to business. How much are you willing to pay for this luxurious one-bedroom unit in the heart of the city?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm interested in the apartment, and I'm looking to get the best deal possible. I'm a student, and I need a place that's not only comfortable but also affordable. What's the lowest price you're willing to offer for this unfurnished 50 square meter apartment in the city center?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, as a landlord, I understand that you're looking for a balance of comfort and affordability. While I can't go below my asking price, I'm willing to negotiate to find a fair rate that works for both of us. What's your budget range for this apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm flexible with my budget, but I'm hoping to find a place that won't exceed 800 Euros per month. Given the size and location of this apartment, I'm sure we can come to an agreement that suits both our needs. What's your initial offer?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, your budget of 800 Euros per month is quite reasonable for an unfurnished apartment in the city center. However, given the recent surge in demand for rental properties in München, I'm afraid I can't meet that price. I'm looking to secure a rate closer to 900 Euros per month. What do you think about this offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of 900 Euros per month is quite close to my budget limit. While I appreciate the quality of the apartment and its central location, I need to consider other expenses as a student. Is there any possibility of negotiating a lower price?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, as a landlord, I'm committed to finding a tenant who appreciates the value of this apartment. While I can't go below 900 Euros per month, I'm willing to offer a few concessions to make this apartment more attractive to you. How does a one-time discount of 200 Euros on the first month's rent sound? This would bring the initial cost down to 800 Euros for the first month, followed by the regular rate of 900 Euros starting from the second month. Would this be more agreeable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of a one-time discount to 800 Euros for the first month, followed by 900 Euros per month starting from the second month, is very attractive. This helps me to manage my initial costs as a student. I'm willing to accept this offer. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
